How did blogs become so popular?

In general, there were a number of factors contributing to an increase in bloggers worldwide. Those factors are technological advancements, political influence, organizational adoption, monetization opportunities, social networking and microblogging.
What are the reasons for the transition from blogging to micro-blogging?

The transition from blogging to microblogging was influenced by several factors such as the emergence of newtechnologies, the need for simplicity and brevity, the influence of key individuals, the changing web environment, the desire for real-time communication, and evolution of blogging practices.
